name: Featherfall Judgment
title: Cyno: Featherfall Judgment
inPlayDescription: When your Cyno, who has this card equipped, uses Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer while having at least 2 levels of Pactsworn Pathclearer's Indwelling effect, deal +2 DMG. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Cyno to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Cyno, equip this card.After Cyno equips this card, immediately use Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer once.When your Cyno, who has this card equipped, uses Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer while having an even number of level of Pactsworn Pathclearer's Indwelling effect, deal +1 DMG.(You must have Cyno in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

Combat Action: When your active character is Cyno, equip this card. After Cyno equips this card, immediately use Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer once. When your Cyno, who has this card equipped, uses Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer while having at least 2 levels of Pactsworn Pathclearer's Indwelling effect, deal +2 DMG. (Once per Round) (You must have Cyno in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
